title: If the Cape Fear Skyway Bridge is built, who will use it?  Is there really any need for a bridge at that location?
text:
Here's a link to the latest story at StarNewsOnline.com, along with
related links to stories about the bridge. I hope those links will
help to answer your question.
http://www.starnewsonline.com/article/20101004/ARTICLES/101009853?p=1&tc=pg
